alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:35PM CDT until June 20 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Eastern St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 335 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Killona to near Luling, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Mathews, Montz, Luling, Garyville, Boutte, Raceland, Destrehan, Killona, Norco, Paradis, Des Allemands, Edgard, South Vacherie, North Vacherie and Wallace. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 193 and 200. Interstate 310 between mile markers 5 and 11. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist
